analyzed: khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /

original: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni //
translated: Having bound the vajra-binding,

original: yid kyis khros nas dgab bya ba'i //
analyzed: yid kyis khros nas dgab bya ba'i //
translated: one should cover with the mind of wrath.

original: rdo rje mthe bong dam po ste //
analyzed: rdo rje mthe bong dam po ste //

original: khro bo ti r'inti rir bshad //
analyzed: khro bo ti r'inti rir bshad //

original: de nas rdo rje skyil mo krung phyed du 'dug la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje skyil mo krung phyed du 'dug la /
translated: Then, sitting in the half vajra posture,

original: rdo rje ti r'inti ri bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ti r'inti ri bcing bar bya ste /
translated: one should bind the vajra Tīrntrika.

analyzed: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a rka h'um aa bhishinytsa m'am zhes bya bas rdo re phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
translated: With “Oṃ vajra jvālānalārika hūṃ abhiṣiñcāmi māṃ,” one should take the empowerment of the vajra garland.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcing ba'i mthe bong gnyis gshibs te bsgreng pas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcing ba'i mthe bong gnyis gshibs te bsgreng pas blang bar bya'o //
translated: One should take it with the vajra fist with the two thumbs side by side and extended.

original: rdo je bsdams pa steng nas dgab pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni rdo rje ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo je bsdams pa steng nas dgab pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni rdo rje ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The vajra fist placed in the manner of covering above is the mudra of the vajra Tīrntrika.

analyzed: aom tu'm zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis kyi go cha 'dis go bgos nas /

analyzed: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a rka h'um zhes bya ba brjod cing /

analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje kho tshur snying gar bzhag nas /
translated: one should place the left vajra fist at the heart

analyzed: g-yas pa'i rdo re khu tshur bsor zhing bgegs thams cad la bsnun par bya'o //
translated: and with the right vajra fist one should beat and strike all obstructors.

original: de nas rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas bgegs bsreg pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas bgegs bsreg pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: Then, with the mudra of Vajra Fire, one should burn away obstructors and so forth,

original: h'um badzra aa na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bhanydzar na h'um phat ces brjod cing bya'o //
analyzed: h'um badzra aa na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bhanydzar na h'um phat ces brjod cing bya'o //

original: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
translated: Then, having bound the Vajra Bind internally,

original: sor mo 'bar ba'i snying po can mthe bong rdo rjer bsgrengs pa 'di ni rdo rje me'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: sor mo 'bar ba'i snying po can mthe bong rdo rjer bsgrengs pa 'di ni rdo rje me'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: the one with the essence of blazing fingers, the vajra of the extended thumbs, is the pledge mudra of Vajra Fire.

original: de'i rjes la badzra nee tri banbha sarbba bi ghn'am zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan pas bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la badzra nee tri banbha sarbba bi ghn'am zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan pas bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya'o //
translated: After that, with the mantra Vajra Netri Bhanbha Sarva Vighnān, one should bind all obstructors with the mudra.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bong gnyis brkyang ste /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bong gnyis brkyang ste /
translated: Having bound the Vajra Bind, extend both thumbs,

original: mnyam la gzhag pa ni rdo re spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mnyam la gzhag pa ni rdo re spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: and place them together: this is the mudra of Vajra Eye.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang ba sa la bzhag ste /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang ba sa la bzhag ste /
translated: Having extended the Vajra Bind, place it on the ground,🔽and

analyzed: aom badzra dri dho me bha wa raksha sarbam sv'a h'a zhes bya ba dang bcas pas 'og bcing bar bya'o // rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan gyi phyag rgya dang / aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat ces bya ba dang bcas pas steng bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Bind below with the mudra of Vajra Bhairava's eye and the mantra Om vajra dridho me bhava rakṣa sarvam svahā.🔽Bind above with the mudra of Vajra Bhairava's eye and the mantra Om hulu hulu hum phat.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings @51a * //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings @51a * //
translated: Form the two vajra fists

original: la mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bskor te /
analyzed: la mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bskor te /
translated: and whirl them like a firebrand.

original: mgo bo'i steng du mdzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul du bzhag pa ni /
analyzed: mgo bo'i steng du mdzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul du bzhag pa ni /
translated: Place the index fingers in the form of hooks above the head.

original: rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudra of Vajra Bhairava's eye.

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes bya ba dang bcas pas de'i 'og tu yang de nyid bcing bar bya'o ;
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes bya ba dang bcas pas de'i 'og tu yang de nyid bcing bar bya'o ;
translated: With the mudra of Vajra Yaka and the mantra Om vajra yakṣa hum, bind below with that very mudra.

original: / rdo rje thal mo'i mthe bong gnyis brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis mche ba lta bur byas pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: / rdo rje thal mo'i mthe bong gnyis brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis mche ba lta bur byas pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The two thumbs of the vajra añjali are extended and the two index fingers are made like fangs. This is the mudra of Vajra Yaka.

original: rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgyas aom drum bandha ham zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgyas aom drum bandha ham zhes bya ba'am /
translated: With the mudra of Vajroṣṇīṣa and the mantra “Oṃ dhuṃ ban-dha ham,”

original: h'um zhes bya ba dang bcas pas shar phyogs bcing bar bya'o //🔽rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel la /
analyzed: h'um zhes bya ba dang bcas pas shar phyogs bcing bar bya'o // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel la /
translated: or just “huṃ,” bind the east.🔽Interlock the two vajra fists with the little fingers,

original: mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar te bzlog nas spyi bor bzhag ste rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar te bzlog nas spyi bor bzhag ste rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: and place the tips of the two index fingers together, reverse them, and place them on the crown of the head—this is the mudra of Vajroṣṇīṣa.

analyzed: rdo rje zhags pa dang aom h'um badzra p'a sha hr'i:zhes bya bas de nyid bcing bar bya'o //
translated: With the vajra lasso and the mantra “Oṃ hūṃ vajrapāśa hriḥ,” bind that.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mkhrig ma gnyis mdud pa byas pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mkhrig ma gnyis mdud pa byas pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mudra of the vajra lasso is to make a fist with the two vajra fists and cross the two wrists.

original: rdo rje ba dan dang aom badzra p'a tam ke p'a tam ke ni ra tra ta zhes bya bas nub bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ba dan dang aom badzra p'a tam ke p'a tam ke ni ra tra ta zhes bya bas nub bcing bar bya'o //
translated: With the vajra banner and the mantra “Oṃ vajrapāṭa pāṭa niraya traṭ,” bind the west.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du byas te /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du byas te /
translated: From the vajra bond, make the two thumbs in the sattva posture.

original: mdzub mo gnyis mnyam por gshibs te phye la /
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis mnyam por gshibs te phye la /
translated: The two index fingers are extended together and spread.🔽The two little fingers are like banners.

original: mthe'u chung gnyis ba dan ltar bya ba ni rdo rje ba dan gyi phyag rgya'o //🔽rdo rje nag mo dang hr'i: badzra k'a li ru ta ma ta zhes bya bas byang bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: mthe'u chung gnyis ba dan ltar bya ba ni rdo rje ba dan gyi phyag rgya'o // rdo rje nag mo dang hr'i: badzra k'a li ru ta ma ta zhes bya bas byang bcing bar bya'o //
translated: This is the mudra of the vajra banner.🔽With the mudra of Vajrayaksha, display it at the heart.

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya snying gar bstan par byas pa ni rdo rje nag mo'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya snying gar bstan par byas pa ni rdo rje nag mo'i'o //
translated: This is the mudra of Vajrakalika.

original: rdo rje rtse mo dang aom badzra shi kha ri ru ta ma ta zhes bya bas lho bcing bar bya'o //🔽rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul du bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mo dang aom badzra shi kha ri ru ta ma ta zhes bya bas lho bcing bar bya'o // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul du bya'o //
translated: With the mudra of Vajra Peak, recite Om Vajra Shikhani Rudramata.🔽This is the mudra of Vajrakalika.

original: rdo rje las dang h'um badzra karmma zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor bcing bar byas la rab bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje las dang h'um badzra karmma zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor bcing bar byas la rab bya'o //
translated: With the mudra of Vajra Karma, recite Hum Vajra Karma.🔽This is the mudra of Vajra Karma.

original: yang nang du rdo rje h'um mdzad dang h'um zhes bya bas rab bya ste /
analyzed: yang nang du rdo rje h'um mdzad dang h'um zhes bya bas rab bya ste /
translated: Again, inside, with Vajra Humkara, recite Hum.🔽This is the mudra of Vajra Humkara.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mkhrig ma bsnol te mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel la /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mkhrig ma bsnol te mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel la /
translated: Make two vajra fists and cross the forearms.

original: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub tu byas pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub tu byas pa'o //
translated: The “conquest of the three realms” is made by forming the threatening gesture with both index fingers.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad de nyid las mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas pa ni rdo rje las kyi'o //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad de nyid las mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas pa ni rdo rje las kyi'o //
translated: From that very Vajrahūṃkāra, the index finger and the middle finger are made into a vajra, which is the “Vajra Action.”

original: rdo rje bsdams pa dang badzra bandzra bam zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dra ba bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa dang badzra bandzra bam zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dra ba bya'o //
translated: The “vajra binding” and the “vajra-vajra-vaṃ” are used to make the vajra net.

original: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri'i chu'i snod las lha'i khang pa'i @51b sgor bsang gtor bya zhing /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri'i chu'i snod las lha'i khang pa'i @51b sgor bsang gtor bya zhing /
translated: Then, with the perfume water that has been completely enchanted with the Vajrayakṣa mantra, sprinkle the door of the divine house.

original: gzhan yang rdo rje rtse mos yongs su bzlas pa'i dri chu dang / rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bzlas pas mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad bsang gtor bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang rdo rje rtse mos yongs su bzlas pa'i dri chu dang / rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bzlas pas mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad bsang gtor bya'o //
translated: Moreover, with the perfume water that has been completely enchanted with the Vajraśekhara mantra, and with the recitation of the mantra together with the vajra-fire mudrā, sprinkle all the branches of offering.

original: aom badzra pushpe h'um zhes bya ba dang me tog gi phyag rgyas me tog go //
analyzed: aom badzra pushpe h'um zhes bya ba dang me tog gi phyag rgyas me tog go //
translated: With the “Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ” and the flower mudrā, offer flowers.

original: aom badzra gandhe h'um zhes bya ba dang / dri'i phyag rgyas dri'o //
analyzed: aom badzra gandhe h'um zhes bya ba dang / dri'i phyag rgyas dri'o //
translated: With the “Oṃ vajra gandhe hūṃ” and the perfume mudrā, offer perfume.

analyzed: aom badzra dh'u pe h'um zhes bya ba dang bdug pa'i phyag rgyas bdug spos so // aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharmm'a n'am /
translated: With the incense gesture, one should offer incense with the mantra “Oṃ vajra incense hūṃ.”

original: a'adya nu tpanna tv'a ta ces bya bas ral gri'i phyag rgyas ni lha bshos dang gtor ma'o //
analyzed: a'adya nu tpanna tv'a ta ces bya bas ral gri'i phyag rgyas ni lha bshos dang gtor ma'o //
translated: With the sword gesture, one should offer food and sacrificial cakes with the mantra “Aka ro mukham sarva dharma nāṃ / adya nutpannatvā tā.”

original: rdo rje bsdams pa las ral gri 'debs pa'i tshul du bya ba ni ral gri'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa las ral gri 'debs pa'i tshul du bya ba ni ral gri'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The sword gesture is made by forming the vajra bond and extending the index fingers as if drawing a sword.

original: aom badzra a'a lo ke h'um zhes bya ba dang / mar me'i phyag rgyas mar me'o //
analyzed: aom badzra a'a lo ke h'um zhes bya ba dang / mar me'i phyag rgyas mar me'o //
translated: With the lamp gesture, one should offer lamps with the mantra “Oṃ vajra lamp hūṃ.”

original: til dang so ba dang ku sha dang / me tog dkar po dri zhim pa dang / 'bras yos dang / tsandan dang / chu dag dung chos la sogs pa'i nang du bcug pa la rdo rje snyim pa'i me tog kha phye ba'i mchod yon gyi phyag rgya dang /
analyzed: til dang so ba dang ku sha dang / me tog dkar po dri zhim pa dang / 'bras yos dang / tsandan dang / chu dag dung chos la sogs pa'i nang du bcug pa la rdo rje snyim pa'i me tog kha phye ba'i mchod yon gyi phyag rgya dang /
translated: One should place sesame, barley, kuśa grass, fragrant white flowers, parched rice, sandalwood, and water in a conch shell, and so on, and with the flower-opening welcome-offering gesture of the vajra palms,

original: aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba lan gsum mam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas la /
analyzed: aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba lan gsum mam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas la /
translated: one should recite the mantra “Oṃ vajra satva hūṃ” three, seven, or twenty-one times.

original: de dag thams cad gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad gzhag par bya'o //
